entities.name: myrtle
entities.description: Myrtle is a ghost who is being talked to by Harry in the bathroom. She is described as having 'sudden tears' and her voice is 'shrilly'. ("At this, Myrtle’s eyes filled with sudden tears again.")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is talking to Myrtle in the bathroom. He seems to be unaware of Myrtle's death and asks how he is supposed to breathe. ("Myrtle,” Harry said slowly , “how am I supposed to breathe?")

entities.name: olive hornby
entities.description: Olive Hornby is a person who found Myrtle's body after she died. She is mentioned in the context of how long it took for her body to be discovered. ("Took them hours and hours to find my body — I know, I was sitting there waiting for them.")
